summary: Comprehensive testing of Phase 2 data space incorporation feature completed. Backend APIs working at 97.3% success rate with full project management functionality. Frontend UI fully functional with proper project tab visibility, form fields, checklist auto-updates, and client read-only access.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 when no token provided
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate unauthorized access

passed_tests: Asesor can see 'Proyecto (Fase 2)' tab for companies with apta status
Asesor can select espacio de datos and checklist updates automatically
Asesor can select modalidad (participante/proveedor) and checklist updates
Asesor can write caso de uso and checklist updates automatically
Asesor can mark validación RGPD and checklist updates automatically
Checklist shows 4 items with ✅/⬜ status auto-updated correctly
Button 'Marcar como En progreso' works when status is pendiente
Button 'Marcar como Completada' only works when checklist is complete
Error shown when trying to complete with incomplete checklist
Cliente with apta company sees incorporation status (Completada)
Cliente sees espacio de datos, modalidad and caso de uso in read-only
Cliente sees visual progress of checklist with completed items
Cliente without project sees appropriate 'En evaluación' message
API PUT /api/companies/{id}/project updates fields correctly
API validates that completion requires complete checklist
Project space name updates trigger automatic checklist update
Project target role updates trigger automatic checklist update
Project use case updates trigger automatic checklist update
Project RGPD validation updates trigger automatic checklist update
Project status updates from pendiente to en_progreso work correctly
Project status update to completada fails with incomplete checklist
Project status update to completada succeeds with complete checklist
Client dashboard shows all project details for apta companies
Client dashboard shows space name, target role, use case correctly
Client dashboard shows checklist progress visually
Client dashboard shows appropriate status for lead companies
All form fields have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Space name dropdown includes all required data spaces
Target role dropdown includes participante and proveedor options
Use case textarea allows proper text input and validation
RGPD checkbox functions correctly with proper validation
Incorporation status badges display correctly (Pendiente/En progreso/Completada)
Project banner shows correctly for apta companies with projects
Navigation between tabs (Datos/Diagnóstico/Proyecto) works correctly
Role-based access: only asesor can edit project fields
Role-based access: cliente sees project info in read-only mode
Integration between backend API and frontend forms working seamlessly
